resources.string:
This app helps you to control your room wirelessly.
Follow these steps to get started.

1)	Select the device that you want to connect to.
	(Make sure it has been paired)

2)	Once the CONNECTED notification is shown, you can start turning on and off the swithces.
	In case you do not get the CONNECTED notification, press RE-CONNECT and try again

NOTE:You need to setup the arduino with the switch board.
